title: Ep 207: Bonding, Chastity Belts & Needing Male Orgasms (Ft. Troy)
itunes:title: Ep 207: Bonding, Chastity Belts & Needing Male Orgasms (Ft. Troy)
description:
This week the duo is joined by Troy, the intimacy coordinator and co-writer of the Netflix hit show Bonding. This week we get into how sex and BDSM is portrayed on film and television. The ladies also hit up a friend to discuss why as women we are programmed to need the male nut. WHY? Orgasms are important on both ends apparently. For the WD we discuss the pricey side of sex toys and how kinky Troy’s collection gets. She references one item cost as much as $22,000! 


Follow this week’s guest
